title: Tektro becomes Bosch Antilock Brakes partner for e-bike spec
content:
The Bosch ABS system for e-bikes gets a new partner with Tektro and TRP brake options for electric city, trekking, touring, and mountain bikes.

The post Tektro becomes Bosch Antilock Brakes partner for e-bike spec appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
